name: Procedural Staffs (Demo)
description:
This is an old project of mine that I worked on and toyed around with procedurally generated weapon stats. I came across it and decided just to upload it to have more stuff. It's well-polished I'm my opinion but I lost interest after proving the concept and making 3 levels. There's a lot for the 3 levels but that is it.

If you want to test out the system here are the dev hotkeys:

Shift+RMB = Spawn LVL 100 staff;

Shift+R = Room Restart/Respawn Enemys;

The enemy sprites are from: 16x16 Dungeon Tileset

The tile/item/character set  is from: Pixel_Poem Dungeon Tileset
